title: How to get to gold wth ease. I show you how to get your season reward easily!
body:
Hello everyone!

I´m starting to become an educational streamer and want to show you some advices for climbing out of silver and bronze! 
Im currently Gold 3 and climbing my way to plat, so I know all of your struggles and I´m not so far away from you like some of these high elo streamers!

If there is something you don´t understand just ask me in the twitch chat and i help you out! 


See you on my stream and if you like it, make sure to hit that follow button!

https://www.twitch.tv/watchagon
